title: The width of passage shall be minimum 1
clause_text: The width of passage shall be minimum 1.2 m. for residential use & 2.0 m. for commercial use.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
